title: Lemon and strawberry roulade
description: This recipe makes twice as much lemon curd as you need, but you can store the rest in a sterilized jar in the fridge for up to a week.
ingredients: 20g/¾oz unsalted butter, melted, plus extra for greasing
4 unwaxed lemons, finely grated zest and juice
3 large free-range eggs and 1 large free-range yolk, beaten
30g/1oz icing sugar, plus extra for dusting
150g/5½oz strawberries, 3 reserved for decoration, rest sliced
50g/1¾oz shelled pistachios, pulsed in a food processor to fine crumbs
